pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/devices/hiden_zero_one_driver)Hiden Zero-One Driver (Zero-One)$(/l)$(br2)Used to craft ZeroZero-One's $(l:zero_one/devices/forceriser_001)MetsubouJinrai Forceriser (ZeroZero-One)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#rising_hopper)Rising Hopper$(/l) form$(br2)Used to access Vulcan's $(l:zero_one/riders/vulcan#rising_hopper)Rising Hopper$(/l) form

Obtained by using $(l:zero_one/items/blank_progrisekey)Blank Progrisekeys$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/hiden_3d_printer)HIDEN 3D Printer$(/l)$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:zero_one/mobs/trilobite_magia)Trilobite Magia$(/l)
